attributes.long-description: Based on the upcoming movie by Robert Zemeckis, you are Beowulf, legendary Norse warrior with the strength of thirty men – arrogant, carnal, self-serving and lustful for gold and glory. You journey to Denmark to destroy a blood-thirsty beast that is wreaking havoc on the frigid land. But the evil persists, and you succumb to its promise of easy power, propelling yourself onto the Danish Throne. LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures takes the fun and creative construction of LEGO and combines it with the wits, daring and non-stop action from the original cinematic adventures that enthralled audiences everywhere. With a unique tongue-in-cheek take on the original adventures, LEGO Indiana Jones follows Dr. Jones escapades through the jungles of South America to the mountaintops of India.
attributes.name: Beowulf The Game
